apihelp-wikispeech-segment-summary: Dividi el contegnuo HTML de na voxe in segminti.
apihelp-wikispeech-segment-param-page: El tìtoło de na voxe da segmentar.
apihelp-wikispeech-segment-param-removet:
HTML tags that should be removed completely during cleaning, as a JSON object of the format: 
{
  "tag1": true,
  "tag2": "css-class",
  "tag3": ["css-class-1", "css-class-2"]
}
where tag1 is always removed, tag2 is only removed if it also has the CSS class css-class and tag3 is only removed if it also has the CSS class css-class-1 or css-class-2.
apihelp-wikispeech-segment-param-segment: Tag HTML che i garia da desfar in segminti.
apihelp-wikispeech-segment-example-1: Segmenta ła pàjina prinsipałe doparando i paràmatri de configurasion.
apihelp-wikispeech-segment-example-2: Segment using custom parameters. The tag sup is removed and so is div when it has the class toc. The tags h1 and h2 break segments.
apierror-wikispeech-segment-removetagsin: <var>removetags</var> is not a valid JSON string.
removetags is not of a valid format. It must be an object with the values being booleans, strings or arrays of strings. To not remove any tags, set removetags to empty object, {}.
apihelp-wikispeech-listen-param-voice: Voxe da doparar. Se no vien definio, vegnarà doparada ła voxe predefinia par ła łéngua de scolto.
apierror-wikispeech-listen-notallowed: No te ghè i deriti par ciamar sta asion API.
apierror-wikispeech-listen-invalid-langu: $1 no ła xe na łéngua vàłida. Garia da èsar una de ste cuà: $2.
apierror-wikispeech-listen-invalid-voice: $1 no ła xe na voxe vàłida. Ła garia da èsar una de ste cuà: $2.
apihelp-wikispeech-listen-example-2: Dòpara na voxe che no ła sìpia predefinia
apierror-wikispeech-listen-invalid-input: El testo de imput no el ga da ver pì de $1 caràtari, ma contegnere $2 caràtari.
